The GLOB keyword is no longer available. Use the LOCA keyword to select locations for score estimations.
The previous lattice syntax is no longer available. Use the following syntax: LATS / LATH @ MPRI @ DIML @ INDP @ MSEC @ LAYE @ DISB @ BORD @ FACE @ DISM @ KEEP ENDL
The VOLM, SUNI and POIN keywords are no longer available. Use the UNIF or GUNI keywords.
The SEAL keyword is no longer available. Use the new syntax introduced by the MULT keyword.
The RAND keyword is no longer available to modify the initial index of the random numbers. Use the SEED keyword instead to modify the seed of the random number generator.
The COMB keyword is no longer available. The general combination is systematically calculated.
The MAIL keyword is no longer available. Use the EBIN keyword to define the energy binnings that may be used for the score estimations.
The CARA keyword is no longer available. Use the new SCOR keyword and request the predefined score CARA, which includes the content for older keywords: CARA REDU / CARA ETEN / CARA ICSB.
The VOLU keyword is no longer available. Use the LOCA keyword to select locations for score estimations.
The COUP keyword is no longer available. Define a two-group binning using the EBIN keyword, and change the predefined score 2G_SUMMARY using the SCOR keyword.
The SREF keyword is authorized only in the OUTP block.
The XMLC keyword is no longer available.
The N1N keyword to disable excesses is no longer available.
The SKIP keyword is authorized only in the OUTP block.

The NOLE keyword no longer exists. Use the LETH keyword followed by the value "0" to cancel the calculation of lethargies. The LETH keyword followed by the value "1" enables the calculation of lethargies.
The ADJO keyword no longer exists. Use the ADNH keyword followed by the cycle number value.
Boundary conditions are no more defined in geometry but in a dedicated block BOUN.
The VOLU and MEDI keywords are no longer available. Use the LOCA keyword to select locations for volumes estimations.
The initial index of the random number generator can no more be modified but the seed can be modified in the SIMUlation block.
The STEP keyword is no longer available at this place of the input dataset. It must be placed in the OUTPut block.
The BILA and NOBI options are no longer available. Use the SCORes options from the OUTPut block.
The DEBU (or PASS) keyword is no longer available. Use the PASS option of the CYCL keyword in the TERM block.
The MINI keyword is no longer available. Use the ACTI option of the CYCL keyword in the TERM block instead.
The SIGM keyword is no longer available at this place of the input dataset. Use the SIGM option of the KEFF keyword in the TERM block instead.

The NORE and DERE keywords are no longer available. The source fraction is given for all the selected volumes in the SOURCES_SUMMARY score. By default, the source fraction is given for each volume of each mesh of a lattice.

The SOUR keyword is no longer available. Use the SCOR option of the POST keyword in the OUTPut block instead. As for the other scores, the source fractions per cycle are given when the POST SCOR option is turned on.
The TAUX keyword is no longer available. Use the SCOR option of the POST keyword in the OUTPut block.
The CURV or NOCO keyword is no longer available. The display of convergence cuves can no more be deactivated.
The SABS keyword is no longer available. The source fraction is given as an absolute value and a percentage in the .listing file. It is only given as an absolute value in the .out.xml file.
The MMOD keyword is no longer available. Use the MODU keyword followed by a list of modules between parentheses.
The MVOL keyword is no longer available. Use the VOLU keyword followed by a list of volumes between parentheses.
The MHOL keyword is no longer available. Use the HOLE keyword followed by a list of holes between parentheses.
The MMES keyword is no longer available. Use the MESH keyword followed by a list of holes between parentheses.
